price: 102. Así es como Al-lah castiga a un pueblo cuando es injusto. Ciertamente, Su castigo es doloroso y severo.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَخۡذُ رَبِّكَ إِذَآ أَخَذَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ وَهِيَ ظَٰلِمَةٌۚ إِنَّ أَخۡذَهُۥٓ أَلِيمٞ شَدِيدٌ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika akhdhu rabbika idhā akhadha al-qurā wahiya ẓālimatun inna akhdhahu alīmun shadīdun
